TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SpellCheck extends System.Object

summary.span: 向文本编辑控件（如 和 ）提供实时拼写检查功能。

span.span: Provides real-time spell-checking functionality to text-editing controls, such as and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要启用拼写检查器，设置属性`true`文本编辑控件上。To enable the spelling checker, set the property to `true` on a text-editing control. 启用此拼写检查器后下, 图中所示，通过使用红色的波浪线，带有下划线拼写错误的单词。When this spelling checker is enabled, misspelled words are underlined by using a red wavy line, as shown in the following illustration. 仅当 WPF 提供了默认字典时，被支持拼写检查器。Spelling checker is supported only when WPF provides a default dictionary. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，WPF 为英语、 法语、 德语和西班牙语提供字典。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], WPF provides dictionaries for English, French, German, and Spanish. ![具有拼写的 Textbox-检查](~/add/media/editing-textbox-with-spellchecking.png "具有拼写检查的 Textbox")![Textbox with spell-checking](~/add/media/editing-textbox-with-spellchecking.png "Textbox with spell-checking") 若要添加自定义词典，添加到词典文件的位置集合。To add a custom dictionary, add the location of the lexicon file to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Collections.IList CustomDictionaries { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.IList CustomDictionaries
Public ReadOnly Property CustomDictionaries As IList
public: property System::Collections::IList ^ CustomDictionaries { System::Collections::IList ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于自定义拼写检查的词典文件位置的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of lexicon file locations that are used for custom spell checking.
The collection of lexicon file locations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义词典使用词典文件，它们都是扩展名为.lex 的文本文件。Custom dictionaries use lexicon files, which are text files that have a .lex extension. 词典文件的每一行包含作为合法拼写接受的单个字符。Each line of a lexicon file contains a single word that is accepted as a legitimate spelling. 该文件的第一行可以指定字典适用于一个区域设置标识符 (LCID)。The first line of the file can specify a locale identifier (LCID) that the dictionary applies to. 如果未指定区域设置，字典适用于所有语言。If the locale is not specified, the dictionary applies to all languages. 有关详细信息，请参阅[区域设置 Id](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561)。For more information, see [Locale IDs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561). 下面的示例演示针对英语词典文件的前几行。The following example shows the first few lines of a lexicon file for the English language. ``` #LID 1033 TextBlock TextBox ListBox ``` 若要指定一个或多个自定义字典中的是否存在或派生自任何类，通过添加到文件的 URI 中指定的词典文件的位置集合。To specify one or more custom dictionaries for a or for any class that derives from , specify the location of the lexicon file by adding the URI for the file to the collection. > [!NOTE] > 使用若要添加的文件，以便集合会引发异常。Using to add a file to the collection causes an exception. 请改用和以更新集合。Instead, use and to update the collection. 词典文件可以包含为本地计算机上安装的内容文件也可以作为资源文件编译为本地应用程序中引用程序集。The lexicon files can be included in the application as content files installed on the local computer or as resource files compiled into a local referenced assembly. 可以通过使用包 Uri 引用的文件。You can reference the file by using pack URIs. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WPF 中的 Pack URI](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md). 若要启用拼写检查器，设置属性`true`上或任何派生自的类上。To enable the spelling checker, set the property to `true` on a or on any class that derives from . 所有自定义字典中的是否存在，除默认拼写检查器使用。All custom dictionaries for that are used in addition to the default spelling checker. 拼写检查器有关的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the spelling checker, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将添加到两个自定义词典。The following example shows how to add two custom dictionaries to a . XAML 中添加了第一个自定义字典 (customwords.lex)。The first custom dictionary (customwords.lex) is added in XAML. 作为内容文件的应用程序中包含文件并将其复制到输出目录。The file is included in the application as a content file and copied to the output directory. 若要使用元素，你必须包含系统命名空间。To use the element, you have to include the System namespace. `xmlns:sys="clr-namespace:System;assembly=System"` 在中添加第二个自定义字典 (customwords2.lex)事件处理程序。The second custom dictionary (customwords2.lex) is added in the event handler. 该文件是包含作为资源文件，并且编译到名为 WPFCustomDictionary 为应用程序集。The file is included as a resource file and compiled into the application assembly that is named WPFCustomDictionary. [!code-xaml[WpfCustomDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/wpfcustomdictionary/cs/window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[WpfCustomDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/wpfcustomdictionary/cs/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WpfCustomDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/wpfcustomdictionary/vb/mainwindow.xaml.vb#2)]

param.name: textBoxBase
param.span: 检索其词典文件集合的文本编辑控件。

span.span: The text-editing control whose collection of lexicon files is retrieved.

summary.span: 获取词典文件位置的集合，这些词典文件用于指定的文本编辑控件上的自定义拼写检查器。

span.span: Gets the collection of lexicon file locations that are used for custom spelling checkers on a specified text-editing control.
The collection of lexicon file locations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义词典使用词典文件，它们都是扩展名为.lex 的简单文本文件。Custom dictionaries use lexicon files, which are simple text files that have a .lex extension. 词典文件的每一行包含作为合法拼写接受的单个字符。Each line of a lexicon file contains a single word that is accepted as a legitimate spelling. 该文件的第一行可以指定字典适用于一个区域设置标识符 (LCID)。The first line of the file can specify a locale identifier (LCID) that the dictionary applies to. 如果未指定区域设置，字典适用于所有语言。If the locale is not specified, the dictionary applies to all languages. 有关详细信息，请参阅[区域设置 Id](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561)。For more information, see [Locale IDs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=165561). 下面的示例演示针对英语词典文件的前几行。The following example shows the first few lines of a lexicon file for the English language. ``` #LID 1033 TextBlock TextBox ListBox ``` 若要指定一个或多个自定义字典中的是否存在或派生自任何类，通过添加到文件的 URI 中指定的词典文件的位置返回方法。To specify one or more custom dictionaries for a or any class that derives from , specify the location of the lexicon file by adding the URI for the file to the returned by the method. 若要启用拼写检查器，设置属性`true`上或任何派生自的类上。To enable the spelling checker, set the property to `true` on a or on any class that derives from . 所有自定义字典中的是否存在，除默认拼写检查器使用。All custom dictionaries for that are used in addition to the default spelling checker. 拼写检查器有关的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the spelling checker, see .

span.span: The is .

returns.span: 如果对该文本编辑控件启用拼写检查器，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the spelling checker is enabled on the text-editing control; otherwise, .
The is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是否对此文本编辑控件（如 或 ）启用拼写检查器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the spelling checker is enabled on this text-editing control, such as or .

value.span: 如果对控件启用拼写检查器，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the spelling checker is enabled on the control; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此依赖项属性还具有专用的只写附加的属性使用情况。This dependency property also has a specialized write-only attached property usage. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]用于设置该属性的语法是`<` *textBoxBaseClass* **SpellCheck.IsEnabled**`="`*boolValue* `" .../>`，其中*textBoxBaseClass*是派生自的类对象元素，和*boolValue*是`true`或`false`（用例不区分大小写）。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax for setting the property is `<`*textBoxBaseClass* **SpellCheck.IsEnabled**`="`*boolValue*`" .../>`, where *textBoxBaseClass* is an object element for a class that derives from , and *boolValue* is either `true` or `false` (case insensitive). 若要为附加属性在代码中设置该属性，请参阅方法。To set the property as an attached property in code, see the method. 不存在匹配`GetIsEnabled`访问器。There is no matching `GetIsEnabled` accessor. 若要获取的值，获取当前对象属性，然后获取的值和属性从， 。To get the value, get the current object from the property, and then get the value of the property from that . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

span.span: Enables or disables the spelling checker on the specified text-editing control, such as or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这种方法实现的附加的属性使用情况中的属性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This method enables an attached property usage for the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 下面的示例演示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]使用情况。The following example shows the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetSpellingReform (System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase textBoxBase, System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform value);
.method public static hidebysig void SetSpellingReform(class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase textBoxBase, valuetype System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform value) cil managed
public: static void SetSpellingReform(System::Windows::Controls::Primitives::TextBoxBase ^ textBoxBase, System::Windows::Controls::SpellingReform value);

param.name: textBoxBase
param.span: 应用拼写检查器的文本编辑控件。

span.span: The text-editing control to which the spelling checker is applied.
Example controls include and .

param.name: value
param.span: 确定拼写改革规则的 值。

span.span: The value that determines the spelling reform rules.

summary.span: 确定拼写检查器使用的拼写改革规则。

span.span: Determines the spelling reform rules that are used by the spelling checker.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过此方式访问的拼写修订规则指 1990 ' s 法语和德语拼写改革。The spelling reform rules that are accessed by this method refer to the French and German spelling reforms of the 1990's. 当将它用于任何其他语言，则此方法无效。This method has no effect when it is used with any other language. 这种方法实现的附加的属性使用情况中的属性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This method enables an attached property usage for the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform SpellingReform { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Windows.Controls.SpellingReform SpellingReform
Public Property SpellingReform As SpellingReform
public: property System::Windows::Controls::SpellingReform SpellingReform { System::Windows::Controls::SpellingReform get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::SpellingReform value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置由拼写检查器使用的拼写修订规则。

span.span: Gets or sets the spelling reform rules that are used by the spelling checker.

value.span: 由拼写检查器使用的拼写修订规则。

span.span: The spelling reform rules that are used by the spelling checker.

value.span: 对于法语，默认值为 ；对于德语，默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is for French and for German.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定此属性的拼写修订规则是指法语和德语拼写改革。The spelling reform rules that are determined by this property refer to the French and German spelling reforms. 当将它用于任何其他语言，则此属性无效。This property has no effect when it is used with any other language. 此依赖项属性还具有专用的只写附加的属性使用情况。This dependency property also has a specialized write-only attached property usage. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]用于设置该属性的语法是`<` *textBoxBaseClass* **SpellCheck.SpellingReform**`="`*enumValue* `" .../>`，其中*textBoxBaseClass*是派生自的类对象元素，和*enumValue*是值的字符串名称枚举。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax for setting the property is `<`*textBoxBaseClass* **SpellCheck.SpellingReform**`="`*enumValue*`" .../>`, where *textBoxBaseClass* is an object element for a class that derives from , and *enumValue* is a string name for a value of the enumeration. 若要为附加属性在代码中设置该属性，请参阅方法。To set the property as an attached property in code, see the method. 不存在匹配`GetSpellingReform`访问器。There is no matching `GetSpellingReform` accessor. 若要获取的值，获取当前对象属性，然后获取的值和属性从， 。To get the value, get the current object from the property, and then get the value of the property from that . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
